entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Oak Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:12 p.m. CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Overcast. Low minus 9.
